description: Welcome to another live tag team fight here on Naked Kombat. Fighting in the blue trunks we have the dynamic duo Billy "BodySlam" Santoro and Alexander "The Great" Gustavo. Their challengers, fighting in the red trunks, are Seth "The Tsunami" Santoro and Naked Kombat's very own Sebastian "The Tiger" Keys returning to the mat. The roaring crowd cheers the fighters on as they slam each other hard to the mat, fingering asshole's and shoving their hard cocks into their opponents mouth to score as many points possible. At the end of three rounds, the crowd awaits in anticipation for the winner's to be announced. The losers are then punished, humiliated and fucked in front of the live audience before licking all the winner's cum off of the mat.
title: Four hot studs fight for the right to fuck in front of a live crowd!
